title: Introducing East Africa
brief_description: A survey of changes which have taken place during 50 years of British rule in East Africa. Includes modern farming methods, introduction of cattle raising and industry, water conservation, the construction of schools and colleges and hospitals, nurses and doctors bringing health to the people of the land.
